website_summaries.verdict: The step support makes this a good pick for shorter customers.
pros: Workout stations for upper and lower body
Angled 2" thick forearm cushions for comfortable forearm, wrist, and elbow support
Handles can rotate to the back to allow for chin-ups
Extended leg stabilizers with non-slip end caps
cons: If you find the power tower a bit wobbly, try putting a mat under the base

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pull up stand as an addition to my home gym. It was a snap to assemble; quality welds and bends at critical points. All the fastener connecting points lined up well and the finish is nice. I weigh 170 lbs. and include this stand in my routine 2-3 days a week. It is sturdy during use due to the design of the base and it's not bolted or secured to the floor. Very sturdy stand!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Compact Unit
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy gauge unit with compact footprint. Assembly is easy, all hardware is packaged and grouped by assembly step - nice! Got it especially for the dip bar, but knee raise, pull ups and push up handles make for a nice combo. Says rated to 275lb. I'm 180, and it's pretty stable, but not sure I'd like to see 275 on it.
customer_reviews.author: D. T. Neely

customer_reviews.title: (It would have been easy for the manufacturer to add strapping tape to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The shrink-wrapped package with all the nuts, bolts, and washers tore loose around the edges and almost all the sections were empty, with nuts, bolts and washers scattered loose through the large box. The large box had several holes in it, so nine nuts, bolts, and washers were missing. (It would have been easy for the manufacturer to add strapping tape to the edges of the shrink-wrapped package.) We went to the hardware store to replace the missing parts. Over-all, the unit itself seems sturdy. The bottom U-shaped piece is a little uneven, so it has a slight wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and I to use (we are both average sized adults me-5'10" her-5'4") and it works great for the smaller framed person. I can see it getting a little cramped for someone much taller than 6ft. But it went together in a few minutes with little hassle and has a small foot print. Great for what we wanted. The grips are pretty good quality as well unlike a lot of the competitors I looks at in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Solid, Useful, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed without too many unnecessary extras. Pushup feature isn't useful (too wide). Otherwise, works as advertised. This unit doesn't have adjustable feet, so it may not be 100% flat on the floor. Stuff some dense cardboard or thin shims of wood to level.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Mc

customer_reviews.title: and it went together quite easily. We have been using it for a week ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality its hard to beat. Others have complained about packaging. My box was a bit beat up but all items in the box were there, and it went together quite easily. We have been using it for a week now and at over 200 lbs here I have only experienced it wobble a bit in certain exercises.
customer_reviews.author: I like Dogs

customer_reviews.title: good item poor packageing
customer_reviews.text: The equipment it's self is good sturdy easy to assemble but I would recommend having a second person help u set it up and have a socket wrench set on hand as well as far as the package it's self it was horriblely packaged had holes some the parts fell out the packaging lucky they were all their but they tried to tape the holes shut zip tie it etc all main parts will be their but may just miss a few nuts and bolts which you'd have to buy yourself so order at ur own risk if all parts are received it's a good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.author: tom r

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars because I’m tiny 4’11” and 110 lbs so it’s sturdy enough for me. However, my boys try to use it and it gets a bit sketchy... we also have it on carpet so on a concrete or hard surface it would probably be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels very sturdy when in use
customer_reviews.text: Solid space saving design. Feels very sturdy when in use. I use this 2-3 times a week. I'm 5'9 and have weighed between 192lbs and 176lbs and no problems. The dip handles have nice distance. Not too far to be uncomfortable. Could be a tad closer but definitely manageable. I have this in a small walk in closet. Now, I just need to master more than 5 pull ups at a time:)
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M. Sandel

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality Do Not Buy! Frame was Bent!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, packaging was awful, and the metal was bent. It didn't even come with enough bolts to put it together (though I suspect they fell out of the box since there were holes in the box when it arrived). The actual quality of the bench felt very cheap. I ended up returning the product and have since purchased a BowFlex Body tower, and quality is night and day. Save yourself the time, money, and effort and do not purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tloc89

customer_reviews.title: solid as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equipment it is solid as they come I am 5-10 230lbs very sturdy I researched alot and did my homework on all of these and this comes out on top the dip part folds up for more room when doing pull ups it also has push up bar on bottom also if your really athletic you can flip up to do shoulders this should easily cost way more its quality period I highly recommend also very simple to assemble and did I mention very handsome looking machine. .
customer_reviews.author: Larry A

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The packaging and instructions were terrible, but the product itself is pretty good. A little better than expected for the price, but not as sturdy as I would like. It only holds 275 lbs, which is enough for most people, but it kind of limits my options if I want to add weight to my pull ups or dips because I'm already a bigger guy. Overall I really like the product so far, but I've only had it in use for about two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HappyHealthyGuy

customer_reviews.title: I mean this kinda does the job, but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I mean this kinda does the job, but the base is designed poorly. It's hard to explain in words but the bottom should have steel bars all the way across, not hinged in the middle which causes the wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Think twice before buying
customer_reviews.text: I guess Amazon doesn't like the truth or my experience so I'll make it simple: Build 4/5 Packaging 1/5-Why, missing parts upon arrival; Styrofoam everywhere Manufacturer Customer Support 0/5 -Why, called them and emailed no response/reply Product stability 3/5 Why - rocks a little when using for tricep dips
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy gear to get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: After comparing multiple similar exercise gears, I found this ProGear 275 offers several advantages: it's sturdy, well constructed, and appears to be able to last. You can lean it close to a wall since all exercises can be done on one side. As another reviewer has experienced, the gear is heavy and arrived with a few screws and bolts missing, probably leaked out of the box during shipment. It's a simple email to receive the part. The customer service is pretty good. All I need now is to have it transform into strength and muscle...
customer_reviews.author: Revto

customer_reviews.title: Not so much for tall people.
customer_reviews.text: Probably not ideal for anyone over 6' tall. Do not like the inside hand holds for pull-ups. Packaging arrived looking like a grizzly attacked it. Some of the small hardware had escaped the box, but the seller shipped out new hardware promptly. If your under 6' tall and are not expecting too much for the price, you might just love this. Very easy to assemble....
customer_reviews.author: DnJ

customer_reviews.title: It is okay - the finish is nice but it isn't as stable as I would like
customer_reviews.text: It is okay - the finish is nice but it isn't as stable as I would like. You really need nine foot ceilings for proper pull ups. The unit arrived in a busted up box and the parts package was not intact. I wound up having to go to the hardware store to replace a few bolts and washers that fell out of the unit's box. It is not packaged well!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Strybel

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: This tower was extremely flimsy. I didn't expect it to be top-shelf, but I expected it not to wobble and move around. It would probably be fine for a kid or a small adult, but I'm 6'4" and weigh 250 lbs... so I need something sturdier. I returned it through Amazon and was refunded my money immediately.
customer_reviews.author: David P Provencher

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and easy assembly if you use your own tools
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and easy assembly if you use your own tools Took me an hour to put it together, but I am very handy, if you are not handy it will take you half a day. make sure you have your own tools, tools included are not the best I have seen. As for the item itself, looks good and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Yep

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: This tower works well and performs as it should. I am 5'10", 230lbs and it supports me fine. It's a little wobbly during tricep dips but it doesn't take away from hr form or function of the tower. The box arrived like it had been through WW3... and I was missing a plate for mounting/securing the lower cross brace. I was able to assemble the unit with no problems but no luck on getting the missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Q Tonomous

customer_reviews.title: Product nice packaging horrible
customer_reviews.text: Liked product and overall features but I didn’t like that the hardware was scattered in box, product had scratches on it and back cushion was torn.
customer_reviews.author: Royaltycrew

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but you do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Got this on sale for $149, it's worth the price. Performs all exercises with no problem and the base is sturdier than expected. The grips are a little closer together than I would like (5'11 3/4) and the center metal section for dips gets pretty shaky at times, but I have no real concerns with it breaking. I put some stabilizers underneath the base to help with shimmying. Not gym quality but its an excellent value for the product you receive.
customer_reviews.author: MaskedMaru

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading the reviews of this power tower, I was concerned about it arriving with no fasteners. However, this was the only item available with multiple hand positions for chin-ups / pull-ups and a movable dip bar. Much to my surprise, it arrived with all the fasteners! Some of the washers were loose in the box, but I found them all when separating the packing material for recycling. My only complaint is the bases wobbling while doing tri-dips, (I'm 180 lbs) but for the money spent I couldn't be happier. Easy to assemble, took about 90 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Fabricate, Ed

customer_reviews.title: Like several others
customer_reviews.text: Like several others, I was missing some hardware (2 washers) because the packaging was damaged. The stand works well for me . There is some movement when using but nothing dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Broyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Well built...
customer_reviews.text: Great product for home use. I have put it through its paces and has held up quite well with the stress put on it. The product is easy to put together (my four year old daughter helped me) and is made of great material. I definitely recommend The ProGear 275 for a at home gym...
customer_reviews.author: Fred A.

customer_reviews.title: Was rather easy to put together - my nephew did it
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift - so I'm thankful that I have it. However, I now realize that I would prefer a system with a cross bar, instead of how the handles are on this one. Was a challenge figuring out how to use an "assist" strap - and while I have - it does throw balance off (as it's on one side rather than center of the body). It does wobble "slightly" but not enough to make it an issue (in my opinion). Was rather easy to put together - my nephew did it, only had to hold a few pieces in place while he connected them. Nice, sturdy - again, just would have liked a crossbar.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to get a piece of equipment hanging out ...
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared to get a piece of equipment hanging out of the box when it arrives. Also the packing material will be crushed and make a mess to clean. As far as the equipment I have had it a month and it provides very effective difficult exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Decent Dip Station
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than some alternatives but you get what you pay for. Not everything fit together perfectly and ended up getting some wobble when I do dips or pull ups
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and it only took me about 40 minutes to set up. Very sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build and great quality. I am more powerful than ever before.
customer_reviews.author: jmcd

customer_reviews.title: Great tower for aerobic exercise
customer_reviews.text: I have read several reviews of this tower before purchasing. I found the assembly easy to understand and accomplish. I look forward the using this in my exercise programs. It is strong and sturdy. Would and will recommend this tower to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Philip W. Fielder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, feels sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in under an hour. I recommend having a socket set and socket wrench nearby to supplement the provided tools. Parts are clearly labeled in a blister pack and the instructions are clear and concise.
customer_reviews.author: Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with it , it is well built the only thing I would change is the vertical grip. When doing knee / leg lifts , the location is to far toward me ,I feel a bit jammed. If they would consider in place of a fixed / welded hand grip and make it a bolt on with multiple locations ( at least two ) to accommodate taller and shorter people. Overall a very good product can't beat the price..
customer_reviews.author: Tedwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good product.
customer_reviews.text: I just finished putting it together and tried it out. I'm terrible at putting things like gas grills, or furniture together, but this product was a snap. It does exactly what it's supposed to do at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill  Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Just as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It only took me about an hour to put it together. It works great for different types of pull-ups, abs, dips, and push-ups. I was surprised at how much I liked the push up part of the station. I am also happy with the lack of swaying that occurs during pull-ups. I highly recommend the ProGear 275 to other folks who want to get in shape or who want to maintain the shape they are in.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy yet maximizes space!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Very sturdy- just like the one at the gym. I like that all exercises can be done on one side of the machine to maximize space in our small home gym area... great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Murphyj81

customer_reviews.title: great for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: great for a home gym!!! packaging was in perfect condition,all pieces where there, very sturdy (i'll admit, i'm only 150 lbs), and i have plenty of headroom. the few complaints that i've read didn't affect me at all! very happy
customer_reviews.author: dennis brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product at fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed - especially for the price! Box was torn up a bit as everyone indicates - but everything was fine inside. Assembled myself in about 1 hour with my own tools... not sure how long it would have taken with the enclosed "wrench"? Perfect for a female! Arm rests are narrower than any station I have used - just right for smaller framed people. After researching many, the width was my deciding factor and was worth it. Tower is sturdy, can be pushed up against a wall (another deciding factor). This was also the only station with a moveable arm rest. Would highly recommend - especially for women and smaller built men.
customer_reviews.author: J. Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Shipped without necessary bolts and nuts. Once together it ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped without necessary bolts and nuts. Once together it is adequate but definitely not for larger (+200lbs) people as not incredibly stable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: love it. box was completely banged up but all parts except one washer made it to my door. i assembled it fairly simply, no issues
customer_reviews.author: lisa s

customer_reviews.title: We viewed towers at a number of sporting good stores and this product was BEST by far
customer_reviews.text: Outfreakin standing!! I've been a gym rat for years. We viewed towers at a number of sporting good stores and this product was BEST by far. Thick stable tubing, easy to put together, good instructions. The only way you could get better is if you got absolute commercial gym quality. For the at home workout this is WAY MORE than adequate. VERY pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Lourido

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's not to bad. Wobbles some for sure. Pads are nice but otherwise it's typical cheapo Chinese exercise equipment. Do not tighten any bolts, not even finger tight until you've got it all put together. The holes do not line up well at all and you'll never get the bolts in if you don't. All in all it serves its purpose and the price was right so not to bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good looks, easy to assemble, and fits well with my body size at 5'7".
customer_reviews.author: ZEO

customer_reviews.title: Great gear!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Arrived with no damage or missing parts and was easy and quick to assemble. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Szat

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.text: As described. Reasonably easy to assemble and definitely takes up less space than others I looked at. Also, a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: MelLaw

customer_reviews.title: Broke in Less Than a Year
customer_reviews.text: Was fine until i cracked within six months of use.
customer_reviews.author: SarahO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I am 210 pounds built and this feels sturdy while using. Great for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal...Great Quality.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces fit together nicely. The instructions are easy and straight forward...the dips bar folds backward if not used ....great advantage for people who need more space using the pull up bar....Great Buy....Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Samer Hanna

customer_reviews.title: The tower is amazing except I had to use two sandbags around the ...
customer_reviews.text: The tower is amazing except I had to use two sandbags around the base to keep it from wobbling.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan R Carty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was not the best but overall once put together I do a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Panagiotis

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine at a reasonable price. Stable and solidly built. I am 5'11, 190lbs and the machine is barely wiggles when doing dips or pullups.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Roden

customer_reviews.title: worth every Penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I went into this expecting the worst especially when it came to the packaging like many of the bad reviews said. the packaging indeed was horrific however all of my items were packed even though the box look like it fell off the truck 10 times!!!! none of the items were damaged or missing.. the instructions were spot on the assembly was easy for 2 people around 30 minutes. After assembling it, it is easy to do neutral grip pull ups, chin ups, regular pull ups, dips and Ab leg lifts. I am very happy I bought this product and recommend it. Make sure u have a high enough ceiling. This product finished is very tall
customer_reviews.author: Travis "Travdaddy" Stevens

customer_reviews.title: A little bit more wobbly than I'd like and we had to use a socket wrench because ...
customer_reviews.text: A little bit more wobbly than I'd like and we had to use a socket wrench because the included tools weren't cutting it, but so far the hubby likes it!
customer_reviews.author: melissanicole

customer_reviews.title: ... handles are adjustable so it makes doing pull ups easy. I love it
customer_reviews.text: The handles are adjustable so it makes doing pull ups easy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: victoria tsalikis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but the rubber around one of the handles ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but the rubber around one of the handles is damaged, the box arrived with all packaging damaged and when I stand it up the tower wobbles on an uneven base.
customer_reviews.author: 3wiseman

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine seems very durable and was easy to set up. It is well worth the money. Glad to use this piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ballard

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend buying this fitness station
customer_reviews.text: This is not a gym quality unit, it’s not stable at the base. For home use it’s okay when you can’t make it to the gym. I would not recommend buying this fitness station.
customer_reviews.author: Ridge

customer_reviews.title: great design
customer_reviews.text: this is easy to put together, great design, sturdy and versatile. bought it as a gift, and and after using it, now will get another one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: that guy

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy and understandable
customer_reviews.text: It was everything that it was described to be. Assembly was easy and understandable. The rack is solid and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Weber

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for my little workout room
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know the arm rest folded up. It's perfect for my little workout room.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Solano

customer_reviews.title: Decent, fits perfectly in my room. Wobble a ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent, fits perfectly in my room. Wobble a bit when doing pull ups and dips but does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a workout, great idea for good price
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for. Easy to assemble, completely stable. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great tower.
customer_reviews.text: Great tower... wouldn't say totally rock solid it moves around a little bit when doing dips and pull-ups but relatively sturdy and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great workout machine for the one not willing to invest a great deal of time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but everything was there and in good shape. It went together quickly and easily
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as advertised. The shipping box had fairly substantial damage, but everything was there and in good shape. It went together quickly and easily, but I did not use the tools provided; used my socket set instead. Works great,and probably even better when I get in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Carmon L Collie

customer_reviews.title: Broken box and with missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: The item itself was ok but its not as firm as I expected. My problem was with the delivery, the box was very damaged, broken in parts, the smaller pieces came loose inside the box and some were lost. And also it arrived late.
customer_reviews.author: Esogu

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Do NOT buy. Non-functional
customer_reviews.text: So, the main reason I bought this is for the inner D shaped bar to do variety of pull ups. This inner D is NON functional. It is very wide apart, the bar itself is very thin which hurt your hand, and it wiggles with you (I weight 180lbs). The knee raise is horrible as well, the arm rest is so narrow that you can barely pass your knee. I believe I wasted $130 on this useless machine. Do NOT buy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: ... chin-up bars a little wobbly but other than that great quality, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The chin-up bars a little wobbly but other than that great quality, easy to install. Wobbly bars would mean more effort which isnt that bad either
customer_reviews.author: Ashish Ranjan

customer_reviews.title: Best Option!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! alot sturdier than others in the same price range..also takes over a smaller area than others as well!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Can be assembled by one person in less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Neil A King

customer_reviews.title: I was not disappointed. This is a great piece of equipment for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fitness tower after carefully reading the reviews and looking at other similar items. I was not disappointed. This is a great piece of equipment for a very inexpensive price. Very heavy steel and well made. I use it every day. My unit did arrive with the box torn in one corner and part of the tower column was sticking out about 4". However, nothing was damaged and all the parts were present. It was easy to put together and I did use the wrenches provided, although a socket wrench would have made it easier and faster. I did not have any problems with hole alignment or pieces fitting together. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M

customer_reviews.title: Its a nice unit. I get a good workout from doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice unit. I get a good workout from doing a complete circuit. Fits perfectly in the garage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Missing some hardware (broken box on arrival) $2 fix at the local hardware store
customer_reviews.author: emilio perez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a full workout, it's a bit larger than I thought, which makes it very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is easy and quite adequate for dips and pull-ups with varying ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a work of art. Assembly is easy and quite adequate for dips and pull-ups with varying grips. Nice addition to home gym.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PARTS
customer_reviews.text: THE BOX WAS DAMAGED AND IT WAS MISSING SEVERAL PARTS(WASHERS ETC) I SENT A COMPLAINT AND HAVEN'T HEARD ANYTHING YET
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN RAINEY

customer_reviews.title: Good buyq
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Perfect Easy to assemble sturdy for my 220 pounds. I am missing a straight bar for close hand pull ups. Guess I have to work harder.
customer_reviews.author: Fydor

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This fitness tower is not well made. One side of the pull-up bar is lower than the other, making it very difficult to do pull-ups. Additionally, the tower rocks from one side to the other while you are trying to do pull-ups. I'm 5'10" tall and I weigh 175 pounds, and the tower rocks back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: REALLY LIKING THE PRODUCT, HAD TO GET A CUOPLE OF SCREWS ETC. FROM FACTORY , BUT ALL IS GOOD NOW
customer_reviews.author: michaelrmiller

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it fills the bill for what I wanted, which was a pull-up station. The push-up handles turned out to be a nice bonus. My only complaint is when using it for leg lifts, i have to work to keep my arms from slipping off of the arm pads. Everything else works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised sturdy enough for me and I weigh 175
customer_reviews.author: Larry Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: highly recommend this power tower one of the best that I've used
customer_reviews.author: DAVID HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment. A must for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Torres

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation, a little shaky but not uncontrollable,i really like:)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but the design is flawed. The pull up handles are way to far apart and it wobbles from side to side since it it only bolts to the base in the center. It needs braces to keep it from tilting to the side.
customer_reviews.author: msondag

customer_reviews.title: good product but worst packaging ever
customer_reviews.text: it looks like it could be a good product, but due to the fact that half of screws, nuts and bolts are missing it is really hard to say how good it actually is. The other subject is packaging. Really cheap packaging resulted in loss of some parts and damages in back support pad.
customer_reviews.author: John

product_meta.title: ProGear 275 Tower Fitness Station with Extended Capacity Power
product_meta.description: Complement your aerobic cardio workout with the ProGear 275 Power Tower Fitness Station. It offers workout stations for your upper and lower body using your body weight to tone the major muscle groups. It has a reinforced tubular steel frame that extends the user weight limit up to 275 lbs. So sculpt your Abs and strengthen your chest, biceps, triceps, shoulders and many other muscle groups with the ProGear 275 Fitness Station. Some of the exercises that can be performed are: Dips, pushups, pull-ups, chin ups, vertical knee and leg raise. • Extended user weight up to 275 lbs • 2” thick forearm “angled” cushions for comfortable forearm, wrist and elbow support. This station will work your quads and lower and upper core abdominals • Multiple grip capability will help you strengthen your back ,lats and biceps, through different hand positions • The Dip station will strengthen your triceps. • Handles can rotate to the back of the Fitness Station so chin ups can be performed • Utilizes foam dipped grips to help strengthen the pectoral muscles through deep pushups. • Durable powder coated tubular steel frame • Main frame is reinforced with support bar for additional user weight capacity • The main frame is angled so your back can rest on the cushion support to stabilize any body side to side movement • All cushions are 2” thick for real comfort • Step support on the main frame will help shorter users to reach chin up and pull up bars • Extended leg stabilizers with non slip end caps, make the ProGear 275 very stable • Some assembly required SET UP DIMENSIONS: 43”L x 38”W x84”H SET UP WEIGHT: 88lbs CARTON DIMENSIONS: 47”L x 27”W x 8”H CARTON WEIGHT: 96lbs WARRANTY: 1 year limited warranty ORIGIN: China
feature_bullets: 2” thick forearm “angled” cushions for comfortable forearm, wrist and elbow support. This station will work your quads and lower and upper core abdominals
Handles can rotate to the back of the Fitness Station so chin ups can be performed
Step support on the main frame will help shorter users to reach chin up and pull up bars
Extended leg stabilizers with non slip end caps, make the ProGear 275 very stable
